Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires the office of the Medicaid inspector general to pause current audits and not begin new audits temporarily
Summary: Requires the office of the Medicaid inspector general to pause current audits and not begin new audits until the expiration of the declared state of emergency relating to the novel coronavirus (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the office of the Medicaid inspector general to temporarily pause current audits and not begin new audits; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
